Services Access and Availability report.)  
In both Uganda and Zambia, the direct 
obstetric CFR fell in all health facilities in SMGL-
supported districts after SMGL interventions 
were implemented (Figure 10). This finding 
strongly suggests that the quality of care for 
direct obstetric complications improved.
In Uganda, the all-facility CFR decreased by 
25%, from 2.6% at baseline to 2.0% at endline. 
The CFR for EmONC facilities (those providing 
either BEmONC or CEmONC) decreased by 
18%,
